cells.title: variables
cells.text: 这个插件好强啊！这不就是我梦寐以求的全局变量功能吗！
cells.text-en: Create global variables and link them to any property across any layer. Experiment with your designs, keep organized, and unlock new functionality within Figma.
cells.author: Dan Araujo

cells.title: Moonvy
cells.text: 一款设计标注交付插件，体验做得很好，有许多设计得非常贴心的小功能。
cells.text-en: a lightweight and yet professional design handoff platform. You can use it to generate design into specification files with a full amount of detail and share them with your team members.
cells.author: Moonvy

cells.title: Font Awesome Icons
cells.text: 来自 Font Awesome 的图标库。
cells.text-en: The plugin provides access to the entire free icon collection.
cells.author: Vyacheslav Myskov

cells.title: Creative Market
cells.text: 素材市场，可以插入icon，图片，插画等素材，类似于之前介绍过的 Blush。使用起来挺方便的，需要购买。
cells.text-en: Quickly sample thousands of ready-to-use graphics and photos for free.
cells.author: Creative Market

cells.title: Designtips.today
cells.text: 在 Figma 中学习 Figma。。。最近社区了好多类似这种类型的插件，例如：Figmaster，Figma Tips，Mentor...另外，这个作者好高产啊，而且设计都挺好看。
cells.text-en: First Chinese Figma workshop plugin that teach you how to use Figma inside Figma!
cells.author: Lichin

cells.title: Mentor
cells.text: 很值得一看的一个插件，聚合了一些常用的 Design Thinking 的学习链接，和一些模板。
cells.text-en: The All-in-One design helper to supercharge your design process. For all beginners and pros!
cells.author: Ali Öztürk

cells.title: Figmaster
cells.text: 这个插件手把手教你做Design System。类似于 Design.Tips Today，在 Figma 插件里学习。
cells.text-en: The world's first design systems workbook for Figma
cells.author: Mateusz Wierzbicki

cells.title: Globe 3D
cells.text: 将你的地图图片变成可以互动的 3D 的球体。
cells.text-en: Create an Interactive 3D globe based on your flat world map design.
cells.author: Sonny Lazuardi

cells.title: Mesh Gradient
cells.text: 可以生成更加复杂的渐变效果，非常实用的一个插件！
cells.text-en: Mesh Gradient generates a gradient image with an underlying 2d mesh, and lets you edit the vertices & edges of the mesh to get the perfect gradient look.
cells.author: Gautham

cells.title: Variable-Width Stroke
cells.text: 将你的线条变成可变宽度的线条。（好早之前有看到过这个插件，还挺惊艳的，不知道为什么之前没有加进来）
cells.text-en: This plugin adds support for variable-width stroke to Figma.
cells.author: Evan Wallace

cells.title: Lanhu
cells.text: 将 Figma 中的设计上传到蓝湖。 好久没打开过蓝湖，刚看了下，新版本的视觉变好看了，不过还是给人很聒噪的感觉。
cells.text-en: 蓝湖是一个提供最佳用户体验的的产品设计协作平台，可以无缝衔接产品、设计、研发流程，帮助团队降低沟通成本，缩短研发周期，大大提高工作效率。
cells.author: Lanhu

cells.title: Illustrations
cells.text: 作者整理的非常丰富的免费 Illustration 库，而且插入的 Illustration 是矢量格式的。
cells.text-en: Free Popular Illustration libraries for everyone, plugin allows you to insert high quality free illustrations right into Figma.
cells.author: Hexorial Studio

cells.title: Photos
cells.text: 可以选择从 Flickr，Google，Pexels 等插入图片，因为图片来源丰富，用起来比 Unsplash 更好些。不过免费版有单个文件 20张图片的限制。
cells.text-en: Search and insert photos into your Figma files
cells.author: Emin Sinani

cells.title: Same Text Generator
cells.text: 将所选的多个文字批量修改成相同的文本。和之前介绍过的 Bunch Text Changer 类似。
cells.text-en: Generate the same text with one click.
cells.author: Figma.Cool

cells.title: Plugin Store
cells.text: 非常轻松地在设计稿中搜索全部 Figma 插件。
cells.text-en: Very easy to search all Figma plugins in your design work.
cells.author: Figma.Cool

cells.title: Export Variants
cells.text: 这个 Variants 导出的思路我特别喜欢——现在的 Variants 导出的时候，不能自己选择命名方式。不过这个插件做得太简陋了，只有按照中划线这个选项，而且也只能导出 SVG。
cells.text-en: Figma variants are neat however they can be frustrating to export since you can't control the naming scheme.
cells.author: Kevin Gutowski

cells.title: Renaming Convention
cells.text: 将图层名字按照特定的格式重新命名，比如驼峰，下划线，中划线，如果你对命名方面比较严格，可以用这个小插件来帮助你提升效率。
cells.text-en: Rename layer by naming cases.
cells.author: Hiroki Tani

cells.title: Complex Themes
cells.text: 一款轻量化的管理颜色和文字样式的插件，而且可以用来切换不同的颜色主题。
cells.text-en: styling and painting your layouts with different color themes.
cells.author: Anton Shramko

cells.title: Fyfill
cells.text: 绑定 Spotify 之后，可以在形状中填充你收藏的专辑封面。
cells.text-en: With Fyfill, you can connect your Spotify account with Figma to use album cover images as fills. You can also put artist names and album titles in text nodes.
cells.author: Phil

cells.title: Reset Text Layers Name
cells.text: 简单实用的一个插件。如果你的文本图层命过其他名字，可以通过这个插件恢复它的名字。
cells.text-en: Reset all text layers name in selection at once.
cells.author: Marcin Lis

cells.title: Copy & Rotate
cells.text: 非常好用的 Copy Rotate 的插件，可以说是这个类型里最好用的了。
cells.text-en: Create radial interfaces and patterns with rotated copies of elements.
cells.author: Alexander Widua

cells.title: Crack Font
cells.text: 简单实用的小插件，将一句话拆成一个个字。类似于之前介绍过的 Nisa，不过这个因为功能简单，操作起来非常方便。
cells.text-en: This Plugin rotate each letter of a selected text box in a random angular.
cells.author: Ferdinand

cells.title: Perfect Freehand
cells.text: 将你的形状转换成类似徒手绘制的线条的样式，还挺好玩的。
cells.text-en: Turn vector lines into freehand strokes.
cells.author: Steve Ruiz

cells.title: Round››all
cells.text: 将所有有小数点的数值取整，比如圆角，坐标。强迫症狂喜。
cells.text-en: Round everything in your document or your specific selection to the nearest whole number, respecting numerical principals of rounding.
cells.author: Karl Koch

cells.title: SeCo
cells.text: 又一个可以获取知名品牌的 Logo 和品牌色的插件。类似于之前介绍的 Brandfetch。
cells.text-en: SeCo is a simple tool that allows you to quickly find brands & other properties from simpleicons.org.
cells.author: Leo Herrera

cells.title: Addjust
cells.text: 插入一些 3D 的小物件，可以改配色和角度。
cells.text-en: The Addjust plugin adds hundreds of unique 3D illustrations and icons in PNG format to Figma.
cells.author: Alexander

cells.title: Indexer
cells.text: 帮你生成目录，按照页面，链接或者画板，很实用。如果能定制样式就更好了。
cells.text-en: You can make Indexes with links to frames and page in a file using Indexer.
cells.author: Sriram Boppana

cells.title: Color Styleguide
cells.text: 创建所有 Color Style 的 StyleGuide 列表。和 ListCreator 类似，不过是针对颜色样式的，当你需要整理设计系统文档时很有用。
cells.text-en: Create the brillant Color Styleguide page using your local Color Styles.
cells.author: Hiroki Tani

cells.title: Typography Styleguide
cells.text: 创建所有 text stylte 的 StyleGuide 列表。和 Color Styleguide 同一个作者。
cells.text-en: Create the brillant Typography Styleguide page using your local Text Styles.
cells.author: Hiroki Tani

cells.title: ListCreator
cells.text: 将所选的元素，整齐排列成列表，并且将图层名字放在旁别显示。在做设计系统文档的时候，用这个可以帮助里快速整理。
cells.text-en: Create an auto-layout list of your components + label in no time 👍 Handy when documenting your design system.
cells.author: Belfius Bank

cells.title: Figdoc
cells.text: 将 Markdown 文本在 Figma 中生成预览的 Frame。
cells.text-en: Create a document on Figma using the Markdown.
cells.author: Hiroki Tani

cells.title: Sync to Slides
cells.text: 将 Figma 中的 Frame 同步到 Google Slides，而且在更新了 Frame 之后，还可以继续同步更新到 Slides。
cells.text-en: Upload Figma frames to Google Slides with ease. For a hassle free presentation making.
cells.author: Siddhartha Gudipati

cells.title: Jitter
cells.text: 将素材导入到 Jitter，方便快速制作动画。
cells.text-en: Import your Figma projects to Jitter, add animations easily, and export as a video or GIF.
cells.author: Jitter

cells.title: Iconify
cells.text: 非常全的图标库，图标来自 Material Design Icons, FontAwesome, Jam Icons, EmojiOne, Twitter Emoji 等等。
cells.text-en: Import Material Design Icons, FontAwesome, Jam Icons, EmojiOne, Twitter Emoji and many other icons (more than 100 icon sets containing over 100,000 icons) to Figma document as vector shapes.
cells.author: Iconify

cells.title: Icons8 Background Remover
cells.text: 来自 Icons8 的抠图工具。这类型的插件印象中至少有3个。
cells.text-en: Remove background from one or many images at once!
cells.author: Icons8

cells.title: HLFTN
cells.text: 生成半调网点的矢量图。之前还介绍过一个可以对图片进行半调网点处理的插件 Halftones。
cells.text-en: Generate radial, linear or unform vector halftone gradients.
cells.author: Pavel Laptev

cells.title: Pattern Hero
cells.text: 将所选的元素按照所选的格子数复制，来生成重复的图案，挺实用的。
cells.text-en: Pattern Hero enables you to place selected elements or frames in a grid to create patterns.
cells.author: Nitin Gupta

cells.title: PixCut Background Remover
cells.text: 又一个抠图插件，来自 WonderShare。
cells.text-en: Want to remove background from image free? Wondershare PixCut plugin will help you to make image background transparent automatically for free.
cells.author: WonderShare

cells.title: Contento
cells.text: 一个简洁易用的内容填充工具。
cells.text-en: This plugin can be used both in Figma Design and FigJam.
cells.author: Bahtiyar Ahmidi

cells.title: Chinese Text Generator
cells.text: 中文句子生成器，可用来填充文本内容；句子来源于「一言（Hitokoto）」的句子库，涵盖动画、漫画、游戏、文学、诗词、影视等各种内容。
cells.text-en: 中文句子生成器，可用来填充文本内容；
cells.author: MuXin

cells.title: A Selector
cells.text: 一个强大的查找和选择元素的工具，你可以通过元素的各种属性来灵活的交叉选择各种元素，支持中英文切换。
cells.text-en: A powerful tool for finding and selecting elements, you can flexibly cross select various elements by various attributes of the element.
cells.author: Xing Zhuo

cells.title: Siter.io
cells.text: 又一个将 Figma 设计直接生成网页的插件。来自 Designmodo，设计得还挺好看的。
cells.text-en: Siter.io is a website builder that lets you create and publish entire sites without any coding at all. It works by directly exporting Figma design files without converting the designs into codes like HTML and CSS. You can make changes and adjustments directly on Siter.io, and easily import responsive versions of your designs.
cells.author: Designmodo

cells.title: Sources
cells.text: 获取一个 Figma 文件里所有的图片。
cells.text-en: ⚡️ Get all images of your file!
cells.author: Orkhan Jafarov 🦄
